name: nuclide-flow
description: Provides support for Flow in Nuclide

pathToFlow.title: Path to Flow Executable
pathToFlow.description: Absolute path to the Flow executable on your system.

enableStructuredTypeHints.title: Enable Tree-structured Type Hints
enableStructuredTypeHints.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Show tree-structured type hints. Type hints must first be enabled. Requires Flow v0.17.0

diagnosticsOnFly.title: Diagnostics As You Type
diagnosticsOnFly.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Report Flow errors and warnings as you type, rather than waiting for a save
